predictions.text: USD/JPY spot will trade at or above 152.50 at least once by 2025-09-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verified if any reputable FX data source (e.g., Bloomberg, Refinitiv, ICE, TradingView) shows USD/JPY spot reaching 152.50 or higher intraday before 2025-09-30 23:59 UTC.
monitoring_signals: BoJ/MoF commentary on FX and YCC
Risk-off flows tied to Middle East/Red Sea events
predictions.rationale: Dollar-supportive risks—Fed politics, trade uncertainty, and geopolitical stress—raise odds USD/JPY retests intervention-watch highs.

predictions.text: Between 2025-08-31 and 2025-09-30 (UTC), Yemen’s Houthi movement will claim at least two attacks on commercial vessels in the Red Sea or Gulf of Aden.
predictions.verification_criteria: Count incidents if Reuters/AP/BBC or official maritime advisories (UKMTO/MSC-HOA) report Houthi-claimed attacks on commercial vessels within the specified window.
monitoring_signals: AIS traffic rerouting around Bab el-Mandeb
predictions.rationale: Fresh grievances and escalation signals increase the likelihood of renewed maritime attacks and claims.

predictions.text: USD/MXN spot will trade at or above 18.50 at least once by 2025-09-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verified if USD/MXN spot prints 18.50 or higher on any reputable FX platform (Bloomberg, Refinitiv, TradingView) before 2025-09-30 23:59 UTC.
monitoring_signals: Banxico guidance and U.S. rates path
EMFX risk sentiment and oil prices
predictions.rationale: Rising U.S. policy pressure on Mexico and broader dollar strength bias increase upside risks for USD/MXN.

predictions.text: By 2025-09-30, U.S. Customs and Border Protection or the Federal Register will publish implementation guidance addressing the August 2025 appellate ruling on Trump-era tariffs.
predictions.verification_criteria: A Federal Register notice or CBP CSMS bulletin explicitly referencing the appellate decision and giving implementation details (scope, collection, or refunds) is published by 2025-09-30 23:59 ET.
predictions.rationale: Agencies typically issue operational guidance within weeks after major trade rulings to reduce importer uncertainty.

predictions.text: The Drewry World Container Index Shanghai–Rotterdam weekly rate published on or before 2025-09-26 will be at least 10% higher than the 2025-08-29 reading.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compare Drewry’s WCI Shanghai–Rotterdam spot rates: the weekly rate released on or before 2025-09-26 must be ≥110% of the 2025-08-29 weekly rate per Drewry’s public postings.
monitoring_signals: Port congestion and schedule reliability metrics
predictions.rationale: Security risks and policy uncertainty can tighten capacity and lift spot rates on Asia–Europe lanes.

predictions.text: From 2025-08-30 close to 2025-09-20 close, Rexford Industrial Realty (REXR) will outperform Vanguard Real Estate ETF (VNQ) by at least 3.0 percentage points based on adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using a reputable data source (e.g., Bloomberg, Yahoo Finance), compute percentage change in adjusted close from 2025-08-30 to 2025-09-20. Outcome is true if REXR change − VNQ change ≥ 3.0 pp.
monitoring_signals: Activist updates or board/strategic review news
Industrial rent/occupancy data in Southern California
Sector flows into VNQ and rate moves
predictions.rationale: Activist involvement often catalyzes near-term alpha versus broad REIT benchmarks.

predictions.text: By 2025-09-17, CME FedWatch will show a combined probability of at least 40% for a 50 bp or larger cut at the September 2025 FOMC meeting on at least one trading day.
predictions.verification_criteria: CME FedWatch Tool’s ‘Target Rate Probabilities’ page for the September 2025 meeting must show the sum of probabilities for ≥50 bp cut outcomes ≥ 40% on any day up to 2025-09-17 23:59 ET.
monitoring_signals: Fedspeak and market OIS/fed funds futures
predictions.rationale: Policy uncertainty and softening growth/inflation data could shift market-implied odds toward a larger cut.
